subject: Junit & Log 4j together
msgSnippet: Hello, Has anyone been successful in logging the test results or writting any information from tests to log file through log4j ? The log statements in my case
messageBody:
Hello,

Has anyone been successful in logging the test results or writting any
information from tests to log file through log4j ?
The log statements in my case get printed on to the console and also
get written into a txt file created by the junitreport tag in the
build.xml.

The log file does get created but nothing is eventually written into it.

Thanks
Shobhana
